extends java.lang.Object

Class representing a Node from an XML document

Justin Nelson

attribute

public Jattr attribute(java.lang.String name,
                       boolean polite)
Will give you the attribute in this node with the given name. Throws an exception or returns null if this attribute wasn't defined

Parameters:
name - the name of the attribute to find
polite - whether or not to throw an exception or return null in the case of a missing attribute

the attribute with the given name

single

public Jode single()
If this node has one child, this will give you that child. Otherwise it will throw a new exception.

Returns:
the only child of this Jode

single

public Jode single(java.lang.String nodeName)
Equivalent to calling children().single(nodeName). In fact, that's exactly what this method does. This returns the only item that matches the given node name. Will throw an exception if more than one or no item matches.

Parameters:
nodeName - the name of the node to return
Returns:
gives the only child of this node

single

public Jode single(JodeFilter filter)
Equivalent to calling children().single(filter). In fact, that's exactly what this method does. This returns the only item that matches the given filter. Will throw an exception if more than one or no item matches.

Parameters:
filter - the filter to apply to the children of this node
Returns:
the only child of this node to match the given filter

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object

toObject

public <T> T toObject(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
This parses this xml node (and children) into an instance of the given class. In order for this to work, the given type and all types of it's member variables must have a no argument constructor. All types must also only have fields that are primitives, strings, or (array)lists. I'm sure there are other assumptions I made that I'm leaving out. This method is probably not quite ready for prime time.

Type Parameters:
T - the type to parse this Jode into
Parameters:
clazz - the type to parse this Jode into
Returns:
the object represented by this xml

Gets the text content of this node

Returns:
the text inside this node

Parameters:
